mapper.insert: insert into gold_history (user_id, nickname, gold_value, gold_from, gold_desc, create_time) values(#{userId}, #{nickname}, #{goldValue}, #{goldFrom}, #{goldDesc}, #{createTime})
insert into experience_history (user_id, nickname, exp_value, exp_desc, create_time) values(#{userId}, #{nickname}, #{expValue}, #{expDesc}, #{createTime})
insert into bbs_count (time, topic_count, reply_count, user_sign_count, newuser_count) values (#{time}, #{topic}, #{reply}, #{usersign}, #{newuser})
